tool_description: Calculates comprehensive statistical measures and trends for incident data to support quantitative safety analysis and decision-making.

dataset_id.description: Identifier for the processed incident dataset

time_window.description: Time window for trend calculation: 30d, 90d, 180d, 1y, or all

statistical_tests.description: Whether to perform statistical significance tests

error_messages: Dataset not found: Ensure dataset_id refers to a valid processed dataset.
Invalid metrics: At least one statistical metric must be specified.
Unsupported metric: Use standard statistical measures like mean, median, std, count, rate.
Invalid time window: Use 30d, 90d, 180d, 1y, or all.
Insufficient data: Not enough data points for reliable statistical calculations.
Invalid grouping variables: Specified grouping variables not found in dataset.
usage: Provide dataset_id and metrics array. Specify grouping_variables for segmented analysis. Set time_window to focus on specific periods. Enable statistical_tests for significance testing.

trend_coefficients.description: Trend slope coefficients for time-based metrics
